summary: Feature request to support connecting to multiple server addresses from the Core API and optionally the Node gRPC client, similar to the Go SDK implementation.
userImpact: Users cannot connect to multiple server addresses for failover or load-balancing scenarios.
proposedFix: Implement support for multiple server addresses in Core API and Node gRPC client, potentially using custom gRPC resolvers.
workaround: Custom gRPC resolvers can be used to achieve this, though they are marked as experimental in grpc-js.
resolutionDetails: Closed due to lack of demand.
keyQuote: Custom gRPC resolvers can be used to achieve this. Those are marked as experimental in grpc-js and not exposed in the Core API.
